summary: Engineering intern with aerospace background, based in Sydney. Proficient in C/Python, R, STK, CATIA, ANSYS, LaTeX, SolidWorks, MS Office and MS Project. Experienced in mechanical design, testing, regulatory compliance, cross-functional collaboration and producing test documentation.

experience.title: Engineering Intern
experience.description: Collaborated with a team of engineers to create technical solutions for product concerns; produced test record documentation; communicated results to customers; scoped business opportunities; researched FAR regulations to create test records for structural load testing on seats in aeromedical transport vehicles; learned CASA conformity procedures; measured articles with appropriate equipment; reported nonconformities; built and verified products via inspections; analyzed failure modes with Finite Element ANSYS; designed equipment supports integrated on safety barriers; desoldered and soldered components to create LED lights for medical equipment.

experience.title: Sales Representative
experience.description: Recorded sales and purchase orders; provided customer service to Australian and international customers; prepared quotes and followed up; trained customers; up-selling; managed enquiries within 20 minutes; demonstrated ability to work under pressure and meet deadlines.

experience.title: Tutor
experience.description: Tutored students in science, mathematics, physics, chemistry and English; provided fast-paced homework help; assisted students from year 1-12.

experience.title: Mechanical Design Engineer
experience.description: Led mechanical design for CubeSat for Canadian Satellite Design Challenge; used SolidWorks; structurally tested in ANSYS; 3D printed; coordinated via JIRA; contributed to Mars Rover project; designed Gimbal gyroscopic testbed for a Reaction Wheel System; trained new team members; taught thermal, electrical and structural concepts.

certifications: Oracle SQL Developer Advanced SQL: SQL Expert (under progress)
